foreignData.name: Heimgesuchtes Sumpfgrab
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{3}, {T}, opfere das Heimgesuchte Sumpfgrab: Bringe eine zufällig bestimmte Kreaturenkarte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignData.name: Tumbanegada embrujada
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{3}, {T}, sacrificar la Tumbanegada embrujada: Regresa una carta de criatura al azar de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignData.flavorText: Le terrain de jeu du meneur de goule.
foreignData.name: Paludgraf hanté
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{3}, {T}, sacrifiez le Paludgraf hanté : Renvoyez une carte de créature au hasard depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignData.flavorText: Il parco giochi di un evocaghoul.
foreignData.name: Cimitero Palustre Infestato
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifica il Cimitero Palustre Infestato: Riprendi in mano una carta creatura a caso dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 憑依された沼墓
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{3}, {T}, 憑依された沼墓を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードを１枚無作為に選んであなたの手札に戻す。

foreignData.name: 음산한 늪지대 묘지
foreignData.text:
{T}: {1}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{3}, {T}, 음산한 늪지대 묘지를 희생한다: 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 한 장을 무작위로 정해서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: O parque de diversões de um carniçal.
foreignData.name: Cemitério Pantanoso Assombrado
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifique Cemitério Pantanoso Assombrado: Devolva um card de criatura aleatoriamente de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignData.name: Болотный Могильник с Призраками
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.
{3}, {T}, пожертвуйте Болотный Могильник с Призраками: верните случайно выбранную карту существа из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignData.name: 闹鬼沼墓
foreignData.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{3}，{T}，牺牲闹鬼沼墓：随机将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignData.name: 鬧鬼沼墓
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。
{3}，{T}，犧牲鬧鬼沼墓：隨機將一張生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

name: Haunted Fengraf
originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: The creature card returned to your hand is chosen at random as the ability resolves. If any player responds to the ability, that player won’t yet know what card will be returned.
Because Haunted Fengraf’s ability doesn’t target any creature card, any creature card put into the graveyard in response to that ability may be returned to your hand.
All players get to see which card you return to your hand.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
